bill_title: increase the maximum user fee for a participant submitting to wear a drug patch under the 24/7 sobriety program.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to increase the maximum user fee for a participant submitting to wear a drug patch under the 24/7 sobriety program. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 1-11-28 be AMENDED: 1-11-28. A participant submitting to wear a drug patch shall pay a user fee of not more than fifty seventy dollars for each drug patch attached.
